verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* heavens declare \w the|strong="H1732"\w* glory \w of|strong="H4210"\w* God. \w The|strong="H1732"\w* expanse shows \w his|strong="H1732"\w* handiwork.
Day after day \w they|strong="H3027"\w* pour \w out|strong="H3027"\w* speech, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* night after night \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w display|strong="H5046"\w* knowledge.
\w There|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* no speech \w nor|strong="H3117"\w* language where \w their|strong="H3117"\w* voice \w is|strong="H3117"\w* not heard.

\w Their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* gone out \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth, \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* end \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* world. \w In|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H1697"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* set \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sun,

\w which|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridegroom \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* room, \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong \w man|strong="H3605"\w* rejoicing \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w run|strong="H7097"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* course.

\w His|strong="H3318"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w end|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* heavens, \w his|strong="H3318"\w* circuit \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* ends. There \w is|strong="H1931"\w* nothing hidden \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* heat.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s law \w is|strong="H4161"\w* perfect, restoring \w the|strong="H5921"\w* soul. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s covenant \w is|strong="H4161"\w* sure, making wise \w the|strong="H5921"\w* simple.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s precepts \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w*, rejoicing \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s commandment \w is|strong="H3068"\w* pure, enlightening \w the|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w*, enduring forever. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w ordinances|strong="H4687"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* altogether.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* more \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* desired \w than|strong="H3068"\w* gold, yes, \w than|strong="H3068"\w* much fine gold, sweeter \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w than|strong="H3068"\w* honey \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* extract \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* honeycomb.

Moreover \w your|strong="H2530"\w* servant \w is|strong="H2091"\w* warned \w by|strong="H2091"\w* them. \w In|strong="H7227"\w* keeping them there \w is|strong="H2091"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* reward.
\w Who|strong="H5650"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* discern \w his|strong="H8104"\w* errors? Forgive \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H5650"\w* hidden errors.

Keep back \w your|strong="H5641"\w* servant also \w from|strong="H5352"\w* presumptuous sins. Let them not have dominion over \w me|strong="H5641"\w*. Then I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* be upright. I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* be \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* \w and|strong="H5352"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w* \w of|strong="H5352"\w* great transgression.

Let \w the|strong="H1571"\w* words \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* mouth \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* heart \w be|strong="H1571"\w* acceptable \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w your|strong="H1571"\w* sight, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H5650"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* redeemer.
